name: fgmatchpanel
description: web panel that manages updates for matches.
author: Luis Escamilla

scripts.lint: eslint src && echo "eslint: no lint errors"
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run mkdir && npm run build:js && npm run build:css
scripts.watch: npm run watch:js & npm run watch:css
scripts.build:js: npm run build:js:unminified && npm run build:js:minified
scripts.watch:js: npm run watch:js:unminified & npm run watch:js:minified
scripts.clean:js: npm run clean:js:unminified && npm run clean:js:minified
scripts.clean:css: npm run clean:css:unminified && npm run clean:css:minified
scripts.build:css:unminified: npm run clean:css:unminified && lessc --source-map src/css/fgmatchpanel.less dist/$npm_package_name.css
scripts.watch:css:unminified: npm run build:css:unminified && chokidar 'src/css/*.less' -c 'npm run build:css:unminified'
scripts.build:css:minified: npm run clean:css:minified && lessc --clean-css --source-map src/css/fgmatchpanel.less dist/$npm_package_name.min.css
scripts.watch:css:minified: npm run build:css:minified && chokidar 'src/css/*.less' -c 'npm run build:css:minified'
